Name: Mastiha Sour
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Some use a whole shot of lemon juice and correspondingly a tad more sugar. It’s also common to add a dash of Angostura bitters but we prefer the refreshing flavour of mastiha unhindered.
Nutrition: One serving of Mastiha Sour contains 145 calories
